text: The 2015–16 Southern Hemisphere tropical cyclone season may refer to one of three different basins and respective seasons: *2015–16 South-West Indian Ocean cyclone season, west of 90°E *2015–16 Australian region cyclone season, between 90°E and 160°E *2015–16 South Pacific cyclone season, east of 160°E
title: 2015–16 Southern Hemisphere tropical cyclone season
